transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji namaste sir, IndiaMART se [inaudible] baat kar raha hu, kaise hai aap?
Customer: Bas thik hai.
Executive: Sir, aapka IndiaMART par jo listing hai uske regarding mein aapko call kiya tha, to aapko jo service mil rahi hai usme aap satisfied hai?
Customer: Nahi, nahi.
Executive: Nahi hai? Kya issue aa raha hai sir aapko?
Customer: Issue ye aa raha hai ki jo aapne bola tha wo nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Kya bola tha sir maine?
Customer: Aapne bola tha ki aapka jo hai verification hoga, verification hone ke baad mein aapka jo hai jo bhi buyers hai wo aapko milenge.
Executive: Haanji.
Customer: Abhi tak kuch nahi hua hai.
Executive: Sir, verification to aapka ho gaya tha, TrustSeal aapko mil gaya tha.
Customer: TrustSeal milne se kya hota hai? TrustSeal milne se kya hota hai?
Executive: Sir, TrustSeal milne se aapki jo profile hai wo Google pe rank karti hai, aapki jo profile hai wo IndiaMART ke upar rank karti hai, buyers ka trust badhta hai aapke upar.
Customer: To buyers kaha hai? Buyers to koi nahi hai.
Executive: Buyers nahi aa rahe hai aapko?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Sir, aapka business kya hai?
Customer: Mera business hai electronic item ka.
Executive: Electronic item, theek hai sir. Sir, aapko buyers chahiye electronic item ke?
Customer: Chahiye.
Executive: To sir, aapko buyleads aa rahe hai ya nahi aa rahe hai?
Customer: Nahi aa rahe hai.
Executive: Nahi aa rahe hai? Theek hai sir, main aapki profile check kar leta hu, ek minute dijiye mujhe.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Thank you sir. Sir, aapka company name hai Maa Gayatri Enterprises?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir, aapka jo plan hai wo 27 November ko expire ho gaya tha.
Customer: To?
Executive: To sir, aapko buyleads kaise aayenge? Aapka plan expire ho gaya hai.
Customer: To aapne phone nahi karna chahiye tha?
Executive: Sir, phone kiya tha aapko lekin aapne uthaya nahi hoga.
Customer: Nahi uthaya hoga, to abhi kya karna hai?
Executive: Sir, abhi aapko plan renew karna padega.
Customer: Renew karna padega? Kitna lagega?
Executive: Sir, aapko call aayega renewal ke liye, to aap unse baat kar lijiye.
Customer: Nahi, aap batao.
Executive: Sir, mujhe idea nahi hai, aapko jo call aayega renewal department se, wo aapko better bata payenge.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir? Aur koi query hai aapki?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Thank you sir, IndiaMART pe call karne ke liye dhanyavad.
Customer: Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving buyleads after TrustSeal verification.

- Plan expired, impacting buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed plan expiration.

- Advised to renew the plan.

- Suggested to discuss renewal cost with renewal department.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a call from renewal department.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, plan expiration, renewal
